body.name: Busy Board Toddlers Sensory Activity - Montessori Toys 1 Year Old Boy Airplane Travel Essentials Kids Ages 1-3 Road Trip Games Quiet Book 2-4 Yr Birthday Gifts Learning Toy 18 Months Baby Educational
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 12 hrs 27 mins
features: 📘 25-IN-1 ACTIVITIES BUSY BOARD: This is the busy board with a TON of activities. On the front there is the alphabet on the back there are some dinos. Inside there are 6 pages of activities, from buckles, to lace tying, zippers, numbers, telling time, and dates. This is almost entirely made of felt making this the lightest busy board, it has some plastic components with the gears turning, the buckles, zippers, buttons and some others.

📘 LEARN & PLAY: Fun and educational values this busy book has. It is loaded with an abundance of cognitive learning opportunities, as well as some opportunities for your toddler to develop fine motor skills. It's very nice for toddlers to learn how to tie and buckle, and all the other fun learning this book supplies. Well detailed educational package with different activities and exciting learning experiences.

📘 TRAVEL ESSENTIALS for TODDLERS: This busy board/book will quickly become a traveling companion for your toddlers 1-3 2-4. All of these features are packed into a lightweight felt book, which makes the toy easy to pack up and haul anywhere we are headed. The entire set is portable and great for car activities or airplane plane travel. It's also perfect for quiet times like doctor or dentist appointments or church.

📘 HIGHLY GIFTABLE TODDLER GIFT: Little guy likes the bright colors and various items to explore and play with. And they love figuring out the pieces and where to put them. The lovely activity book is great for curious preschool toddlers and early learners. Helps keep little fingers busy! It's definitely good and giftable value. Holiday gift guide for Christmas, stocking stuffer and birthday present ect.

📘 What's in the box: 1*25-in-1 blue activities felt busy board, 1*Giftable box. "Shaping Tomorrow's Innovators" with Control Future Toys. - Our story began with a group of toy designers and parents who shared a common vision - to create toys that not only entertained children but also helped them learn and grow.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is CUTE...
reviews.reviewText: Really nice and very sturdy, helpful for kids to learn. Entertaining!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for a special little girl!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great tool/play item for little ones with special needs, but also for helping teach any child life skills. Working with special needs children for many years and having an autistic son myself, I was very happy to order this for my granddaughter who has recently been diagnosed with possibly having autism too. Cane in perfect condition, as described and fast shipping! Highly recommend seller and product!! Will make a great Christmas gift for my granddaughter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect gift for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: My son is two and he loves to play with this! Keep him busy on car rides!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Our toddler loved this.
reviews.reviewText: We bought this to take in the plane while traveling and it was a great distraction for the kids. It has a lot of different things to play with and help develop motor skills from. I'm giving it a 4 star because some of the velcro puzzle pieces are too small and we have remove them. Also has little fabric fish in the whale section. They could have been a chocking hazard.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Learning Little Fingers!
reviews.reviewText: I am a Grandma now and a very long time ago, I made a cloth book by hand to teach my daughter. It was full of zippers, ties, braids, buttons...you get the idea. It took a very long time to make. I bought this for a friend's 1 year old and I am very impressed with the quality and the different mechanisms to challenge little fingers. Definitely a great purchase! for a growing little one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Granddaughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: My 3 yr old granddaughter was diagnosed as being “on the spectrum “ so I decided to do some research on toys to help her. This has been a life saver for her mom and dad when going on trips. It is so cute and keeps her focused

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great toy, but missing pieces on arrival
reviews.reviewText: Overall, seems like a cute toy to bring to occupy my little one on the plane or car rides, but Velcro pieces are missing (yellow dinosaur)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute but didn’t need it
reviews.reviewText: Got it for a plane ride. Super cute. A little advanced for a 15 month old but I just wanted something he could play with. I didn’t end up using it and sent it back. Had I used it, I would have kept it!
